pr_title: issue #694 - Added ANTLR4 grammar for UCUM code syntax validation

timeline.message:
issue #694 - Added ANTLR4 grammar for UCUM code syntax validation

Signed-off-by: Troy Biesterfeld <tbieste@us.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: Not familiar with antlr lexer/parser, so don't know if it's a big deal or not - is there not a way to avoid instantiating a new lexer/parser every time you want to parse a string?
timeline.author: michaelwschroeder

replies.bodyText: I followed the same flow as FHIRPathUtil.java, which instantiated a new lexer/parser each time, and that appears to be how it needs to work.
replies.author: tbieste
